statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, product_id FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS feedback_count FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING feedback_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, product_id FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC
SELECT feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND rating <= 3.5
SELECT customer_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_rating > 4
SELECT feedback_id, product_id, created_at FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%'
SELECT * FROM feedback_table;
SELECT customer_name, product_id FROM feedback_table WHERE id = 10;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM review_table WHERE product_id = 5;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM feedback_table WHERE product_id = 3 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM review_table WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, customer_name, product_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_table WHERE id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, product_id FROM feedback_table WHERE product_id = 5 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM review_table WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY id ASC, product_id DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, customer_name FROM feedback_table WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) AND product_id = 2;
SELECT customer_name, review_text, rating FROM feedback_table JOIN review_table ON feedback_table.product_id = review_table.product_id ORDER BY rating DESC, id ASC
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_name, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT product_name, description FROM ProductDescription WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, experience_text FROM UserExperience WHERE user_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY rating DESC, feedback_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, description FROM ProductDescription WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT user_name, experience_text FROM UserExperience WHERE LENGTH(experience_text) > 50 ORDER BY user_name ASC, user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback JOIN ProductDescription ON CustomerFeedback.rating = ProductDescription.product_id;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY rating DESC, customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT id, customer_id, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT product_id, description FROM product_description WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, rating, feedback FROM user_experience WHERE user_id = 201;
SELECT product_id, review_id, date_posted FROM product_reviews ORDER BY date_posted DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC, id ASC;
SELECT review, rating FROM product_description WHERE product_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, rating FROM user_experience WHERE rating > 4.0 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT review_id, date_posted, user_id FROM product_reviews WHERE product_id = 7 AND user_id = 10;
SELECT customer_id, rating, review FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating BETWEEN 3.0 AND 4.0 ORDER BY customer_id ASC, rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE rating > 4.0;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, rating FROM customers ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100 ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE rating > 4.5 AND email LIKE '%example.com%'
SELECT products.product_name, products.price, reviews.rating FROM products INNER JOIN reviews ON products.product_id = reviews.product_id WHERE reviews.rating >= 4.0 ORDER BY products.price ASC

SELECT customers.customer_name, COUNT(reviews.review_id) AS total_reviews FROM customers LEFT JOIN reviews ON customers.customer_id = reviews.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_name HAVING total_reviews > 2
SELECT products.product_name, descriptions.detail FROM products LEFT JOIN descriptions ON products.product_id = descriptions.product_id WHERE descriptions.detail IS NOT NULL
